channel.title: The Rusty Bumblebee's Tap List
channel.description: Reporting changes to the tap list.

item.title: 01/31/2025 12:24 PM
item.description:
New Taps:
- Braaaaaaaains - Dark Urple, Drekker Brewing Company
- CHONK: Blueberry Creamsicle, Drekker Brewing Company
- CHONK: Spumoni, Drekker Brewing Company
- Ectogasm, Drekker Brewing Company
- If It Wasn't for the Wind, Drekker Brewing Company
- People Eater, Drekker Brewing Company
- Sour - Smoothie, Drekker Brewing Company
- Super Mega Lager, Drekker Brewing Company
- The Nightman Cometh, Drekker Brewing Company

Retired Taps:
- Drippin'
- Freedom Lemonade
- Limonada Rosada (Limonada Series)
- Smoofee Sour - Raspberry, Vanilla, Guava
- Uncut Jams: Strawberry Rhubarb
